description: Try our easy to follow Beauty & The Beast Carrot & Pumpkin Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Beauty & The Beast Carrot & Pumpkin Soup
name: Beauty & The Beast Carrot & Pumpkin Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: purée vegetables and lentils, using a stick blender, until smooth. Ladle soup into warm bowls, season with pepper and garnish with tomato roses and parsley to serve.
